title: Salty af Yasuo
body:
Not gonna name n' shame but i'll tell you what happened.

> {{champion:238}} I could beat you if i had lower pings
{{champion:64}} (Enemy): Sure sure
{{champion:64}} (Me): Much salt on Zed
*Ganks Zed's lane a few times*
Zed - 0-3 ->  6-3
{{champion:238}} : ezpz
{{champion:64}} (Me): Zed, stop eating too much salt.

*Ends game*

{{champion:238}} : too ez

Usually the mature thing would be to ignore it but it just really got me this time.

Rito pls, do something about those salty chips.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: I'm trying to get good at Rek'Sai and Lee Sin because they both blind, and when I go blind I'll still be able to play thanks to these two champs if I main them. :D

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Kz5qUvEj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-03T13:23:19.137+0000)
>
> Call me salty, 
> 
> But I do get happy every time I see a Lee player not getting what he wants, sorry. {{champion:266}}

Lee sin is the epitome of a burden.
Wait you said Yas was salty
i say 2 ez when i lose only

So basically, you got rekt by Zed in your fail attempts to gank, and now you're blaming it on the fact he's salty?

k.

No. The Zed was in my team.

There can't be 2 BurdenSins on a team.
Had one of these matches as well.
